name: Lifting
description:
Toward to top to draw line!
This app which is draw floor oneself and go up appear at last.
Release Characters collecting gems.
Compare with rival in the world to renew high score.

[How to play]
・Go up to top in order not to drop below by creating floor
・Difference high by creation line.
・Please avoid thunder cloud well.
・We can recording “Lifting”,and share everyone in the world.
